FuncDef:
The dns primary-ipv6 command specifies a IPv6 primary DNS server for the current domain.
The undo dns primary-ipv6 command removes the IPv6 primary DNS server from the current domain.
By default, a domain has no IPv6 DNS server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv6 address of the DNS server.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

ExtraInfo: Modifications about IPv6 DNS server configurations take effect during next login.
